verses.text: And when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w past|strong="H5674"\w* the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \add of the hill\add*, behold, \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* of \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* \w met|strong="H7125"\w* him, with a \w couple|strong="H6776"\w* of \w asses|strong="H2543"\w* \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w*, and upon them two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add loaves\add* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* bunches of \w raisins|strong="H6778"\w*, and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* of summer \w fruits|strong="H7019"\w*, and a \w bottle|strong="H5035"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w*, What meanest thou by these? And \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w asses|strong="H2543"\w* \add be\add* for the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* to ride \w on|strong="H7392"\w*; and the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and summer \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w* for the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; and the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, that such as be \w faint|strong="H3287"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* may \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, And where \add is\add* thy \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*? And \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, Behold, he \w abideth|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: for he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, To \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* me the \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* of my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* to \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w*, Behold, thine \add are\add* all that \add pertained\add* unto \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*. And \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w humbly|strong="H7812"\w* beseech thee \add that\add* I may \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 16.4 \ft I humbly…: Heb. I do obeisance\f*

¶ And when \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Bahurim|strong="H0980"\w*, behold, thence came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gera|strong="H1617"\w*: he came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* still as he \w came|strong="H3318"\w*.\f + \fr 16.5 \ft he came forth…: or, he still came forth and cursed\f*

And he \w cast|strong="H5619"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* at \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and at all the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and all the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \add were\add* on his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* and on his \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

And thus \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* when he \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w*, Come \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, come \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, thou \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and thou \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*:\f + \fr 16.7 \ft bloody…: Heb. man of blood\f*

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* upon thee all the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, in whose stead thou hast \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: and, behold, thou \add art taken\add* in thy \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*, because thou \add art\add* a \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.  +  r 16.8  t behold…: Heb. behold thee in thy evil *

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, Why should this \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*? let me go \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, I pray thee, and take \w off|strong="H5493"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What have I to do with you, ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*? so let him \w curse|strong="H7043"\w*, because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Who shall then \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore hast thou done \w so|strong="H6213"\w*?

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w*, and to all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, Behold, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, which came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of my \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*, \w seeketh|strong="H1245"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w*: how much more now \add may this\add* \w Benjamite|strong="H1145"\w* \add do it\add*? let him \w alone|strong="H3240"\w*, and let him \w curse|strong="H7043"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w bidden|strong="H0559"\w* him.

It may be that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on mine \w affliction|strong="H5869"\w*, and that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w requite|strong="H7725"\w* me \w good|strong="H2896"\w* for his \w cursing|strong="H7045"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.  +  r 16.12  t affliction: or, tears: Heb. eye *

And as \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* went \w along|strong="H1980"\w* on the \w hill’s|strong="H2022"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* him, and \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* as he \w went|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w threw|strong="H5619"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w at|strong="H5980"\w* him, and \w cast|strong="H6080"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.\f + \fr 16.13 \ft cast…: Heb. dusted him with dust\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w weary|strong="H5889"\w*, and \w refreshed|strong="H5314"\w* themselves there.

¶ And \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* with him.

And it came to pass, when \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* the \w Archite|strong="H0757"\w*, \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w friend|strong="H7463"\w*, was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, that \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, God \w save|strong="H2421"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, God \w save|strong="H2421"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 16.16 \ft God…: Heb. Let the king live\f*

And \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w*, \add Is\add* this thy \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* to thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*? why \w wentest|strong="H1980"\w* thou not with thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*?

And \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, Nay; but whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, his will I be, and with him will I \w abide|strong="H3427"\w*.

And \w again|strong="H8145"\w*, whom should I \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*? \add should I\add* not \add serve\add* in the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*? as I have \w served|strong="H5647"\w* in thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, so will I be in thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* to \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w*, \w Give|strong="H3051"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* among you what we shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

And \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, Go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, which he hath \w left|strong="H3240"\w* to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* that thou art \w abhorred|strong="H0887"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: then shall the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of all that \add are\add* with thee be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*.

So they \w spread|strong="H5186"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* a \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* upon the top of the \w house|strong="H1406"\w*; and \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w*, which he \w counselled|strong="H3289"\w* in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \add was\add* as if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* had \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* at the \w oracle|strong="H1697"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: so \add was\add* all the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* both with \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and with \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.\f + \fr 16.23 \ft oracle: Heb. word\f*
